entities.name: professor lockhart
entities.description: Professor Lockhart is a teacher at Hogwarts who has a habit of reading passages from his books and re-enacting dramatic bits in class. He often picks Harry to help him with these reconstructions.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts who is often picked by Professor Lockhart to help him with his re-enactments.

entities.name: pixies
entities.description: Pixies are creatures that were involved in a disastrous episode.

entities.name: transylvanian villager
entities.description: A Transylvanian villager is a character played by Harry in one of Professor Lockhart's re-enactments.

entities.name: yeti
entities.description: A yeti with a head-cold is a character played by Harry in one of Professor Lockhart's re-enactments.

entities.name: vampire
entities.description: A vampire who had been unable to eat anything except lettuce since Lockhart had dealt with him is a character played by Harry in one of Professor Lockhart's re-enactments.

entities.name: werewolf
entities.description: Harry acts as a werewolf during their very next Defence Against the Dark Arts lesson.

relationships.description: Professor Lockhart often picks Harry to help him with his re-enactments.
Professor Lockhart cured the Transylvanian villager of a Babbling Curse.
Professor Lockhart treated the yeti with a head-cold.
Professor Lockhart helped the vampire who had been unable to eat anything except lettuce.
Harry acted as a werewolf during their very next Defence Against the Dark Arts lesson.
